posts.post_title: T206 Newspaper Ads, Hindu, Old Mill etc Wanted
posts.post_content:
Looking for Old Mill and Hindu newspaper ads depicting advertisements for T206 baseball cards. I am looking to buy and or trade from the duplicate advertisements I have. Please email me at [url]kilaartist@aol.com[/url] if you have any for sale or are interested in these ads.
